Key Match Events: Aaron Johnson scored 52 runs off 44 balls for Canada
Mohammad Amir took 2 wickets for 13 runs for Pakistan
Fakhar Zaman scored 4 runs off 6 balls for Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Johnson's performance was impressive for Canada
Pakistan's fast bowlers put on a strong show to restrict Canada's total
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won by 7 wickets with 15 balls remaining
This was Pakistan's first win in the tournament
Others: Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Dilon Heyliger, and Mohammad Rizwan also had significant contributions for their respective teams
